title: Flight Simulator 2020 - MSFS Update - World Update 17 - UK & Ireland
description:
In this video we will look at the new additions to World Update 17: United Kingdom & Ireland which has been released earlier this week. As the name already says it is focusing on different parts of the UK as well as Ireland. Both already received an updated as part of World Update 3 using the latest update some parts are receiving an update again to make them more realistic.

In total 5 new handcrafted airports have been added as well as 79 Point of Interest (POI's). Additionally the aerial photographs, satellite data, LIDAR (light detection and ranging) data, DEM (digital elevation model) data, and DTM (digital terrain model) data has been updated.

And as a bonus you will get three Discovery Flights, two Landing Challenges and three Bush Trips.

0:00 intro
0:10 what is included in the WU?
4:28 installing the prerequisites
10:19 installing the world update
13:33 what has changed after the installation of the world update?
